description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 30 January 2018 (RN 17/02864/FULL) for the Erection of a mansard roof extension to create new fifth floor and erection of rear extension at first, second and third floor levels to extend existing residential flats (Class C3) with terrace at rear third floor for use in association with maisonette (Class C3) over third, fourth and fifth floor levels, replacement window and door at front ground floor level and associated external alterations, NAMELY, to vary the approved drawing numbers to allow alterations to the internal layout and rear fenestration.
